mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Kelley, Benjamin F. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Kelley, Benjamin F.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Sept 6 1861. By Telegraph from Grafton " " 1861. Shall I direct an officer to swear in JG Kelly as Lieut Colonel of Col Evans regiment there are four 4 captains organized & three 3 in camp here. I shall attend the Union meeting at Fairmont tomorrow if possible[?]. BF Kelley Brig Genl 39 Gr122pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Kelley, Benjamin F.
Grafton, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
